page.title: 19RELIGION 2/CLUBS/BUSES 1
page.content: and is Church of England and the Chapel of Lanherne Convent which is Roman Catholic.There are 2 disused Methodist chapels in this area,1 at Trevarrian and the other at Gluvian. There has been a{W.I.}in Mawgan Porth since 1953.Members come from all over and just outside our area.There are many fund raising events for W.I. funds and Charities:Car Boot Sales, Fun Swims,Carol Singing,Plays and Pantomimes,Sponsored knits,Christmas fayres and barbecues.Membership is Â£4. There are 40-50 members and meetings are held at Mawgan Porth Hall every month.Committee meetings for the 9 members are held every month except August.They try to help the old and sick in the community.BUSES There are 3 buses a day to Truro and back and buses run to Newquay from 7.45-18.15. From Newquay bus station you can get
